attributes.additional_details: Channel 4 has always been left field and ground breaking in what it does and definitely for the creatives with great inspirational shows and films. This will change when it is owned by a corporation and just be big business for profit
attributes.background: Stop selling products and services that are owned by us without our consent. That is stealing

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/613995
